cmd='COMMAND;sh;-c;CC="arm-linux-gnueabi-gcc -static-libstdc++" CFLAGS="-O2 -ffast-math -pipe -fomit-frame-pointer  -march=armv7-a -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon -mthumb -mfloat-abi=softfp -fno-finite-math-only -fno-stack-protector -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fPIC" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -ffast-math -pipe -fomit-frame-pointer  -march=armv7-a -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon -mthumb -mfloat-abi=softfp -fno-finite-math-only -fno-stack-protector -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fPIC" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-O1 -Wl,--as-needed -static-libstdc++ -Wl,-rpath,'\$\$ORIGIN'" zyre_have_xmlto=no zyre_have_asciidoc=no /root/koreader/base/thirdparty/zyre/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/zyre-prefix/src/zyre/configure -q --prefix=/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/zyre/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/zyre-prefix/src/zyre-build --with-libzmq=/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/libzmq/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/libzmq-prefix/src/libzmq-build --with-libczmq=/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/czmq/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/czmq-prefix/src/czmq-build --disable-static --enable-shared --host=arm-linux-gnueabi;COMMAND;sh;-c;sed -i -e 's|^hardcode_libdir_flag_spec=.*|hardcode_libdir_flag_spec=""|g' libtool;COMMAND;sh;-c;sed -i -e 's|^runpath_var=LD_RUN_PATH|runpath_var=DIE_RPATH_DIE|g' libtool'
